other_tests.findings: A single enlarged anterior mediastinal lymph node measures 1.2 cm in short axis. Streaky opacities in the dependent portions of lung, compatible with subsegmental atelectasis. A left lower lobe subpleural lung nodule measuring 5 mm in short axis. Diffusely hypodense liver consistent with hepatic steatosis.
NO POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES SEEN. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.
